description: Create dedicated git branches for specific agents via git manager and agentic workflow. Each agent works on isolated branch, orchestrator manages merges.

concept.problem: Multiple agents working on same project can conflict. No isolation between agent work.
concept.solution: Orchestrator creates branch per workorder/agent, agent works in isolation, orchestrator reviews and merges

workflow: 1. Orchestrator delegates workorder to project agent
3. Agent works exclusively on that branch
4. Agent commits with WO-ID in commit message
